      Creates a ZParticleDisplay object from a Bukkit particle to be shown to specified players.

    • Method Detail

      • toDisplay

        static com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay toDisplay(org.bukkit.Particle particle,
                                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
        Creates a ZParticleDisplay object from a Bukkit particle to be shown to specified players.
        Parameters:
        particle - the bukkit particle.
        players - an array of players the particles will be shown to.
        Returns:
        ZParticleDisplay object to be used in the API for creating particle shapes.
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.1

      • toDisplay

        static com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay toDisplay(org.bukkit.Particle particle)
        Creates a ZParticleDisplay object from a Bukkit particle to be shown to all players.
        Parameters:
        particle - the bukkit particle.
        Returns:
        ZParticleDisplay object to be used in the API for creating particle shapes.
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.1

      • createPoint

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createPoint(org.bukkit.Location loc,
                                            int update,
                                            long duration,
                                            com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawn a simple particle point.
        Parameters:
        loc - location to spawn the particle at.
        update - how often to refresh the particle.
        duration - how long to display the particle for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for an particle point
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0

      • createInstantLine

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createInstantLine(org.bukkit.Location start,
                                                  org.bukkit.Location end,
                                                  double rate,
                                                  int update,
                                                  long duration,
                                                  com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawns an instantaneous line from a location to another. Tutorial: https://www.spigotmc.org/threads/176695/ This method is a modified version to get the best performance.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting point of the line.
        end - the ending point of the line.
        rate - the rate of points of the line. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the line.
        duration - how long to display the line for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for an instantaneous line
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        drawInstantLine(Player, double, double, int, long, ZParticleDisplay)

      • drawInstantLine

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask drawInstantLine(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                double length,
                                                double rate,
                                                int update,
                                                long duration,
                                                com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Draws an instantaneous line from the player's looking direction.
        Parameters:
        player - the reference location of the line direction.
        length - the length of the line.
        rate - the rate of points of the line. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the line.
        duration - how long to display the line for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for an instantaneous line
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        createInstantLine(Location, Location, double, int, long, ZParticleDisplay)

      • createLine

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createLine(org.bukkit.Location start,
                                           org.bukkit.Location end,
                                           double rate,
                                           int update,
                                           long duration,
                                           com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawns a moving line from a location to another.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting point of the line.
        end - the ending point of the line.
        rate - the rate of points of the line. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to extend the line.
        duration - how long to display each particle in the line for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a moving line
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0
        See Also:
        drawLine(Player, double, double, int, long, ZParticleDisplay)

      • drawLine

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask drawLine(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                         double length,
                                         double rate,
                                         int update,
                                         long duration,
                                         com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Draws a moving line from the player's looking direction.
        Parameters:
        player - the reference location of the line direction.
        length - the length of the line.
        rate - the rate of points of the line. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the line.
        duration - how long to display each particle in the line for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a moving line
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0
        See Also:
        createLine(Location, Location, double, int, long, ZParticleDisplay)

      • createCube

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createCube(org.bukkit.Location center,
                                           double length,
                                           double rate,
                                           int update,
                                           long duration,
                                           double angle,
                                           char axis,
                                           com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawn a cube with the inner space and walls empty, leaving only the edges visible.
        Parameters:
        center - location to spawn the cube at.
        length - length of the cube.
        rate - the rate of points of the lines forming the cube. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the cube.
        duration - how long to display the cube for.
        angle - rotation of the cube in degrees.
        axis - the axis of rotation for the cube.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for an empty cube
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0

      • createRing

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createRing(org.bukkit.Location center,
                                           double radius,
                                           double rate,
                                           int update,
                                           long duration,
                                           double angle,
                                           char axis,
                                           com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawn a hollow ring
        Parameters:
        center - location to spawn the ring at.
        radius - radius of the ring.
        rate - the rate of points forming the ring. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the ring.
        duration - how long to display the ring for.
        angle - rotation of the ring in degrees.
        axis - the axis of rotation for the ring.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a hollow ring
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0

      • createCircle

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createCircle(org.bukkit.Location center,
                                             double radius,
                                             double rate,
                                             int update,
                                             long duration,
                                             double angle,
                                             char axis,
                                             com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawn a filled circle
        Parameters:
        center - location to spawn the circle at.
        radius - radius of the circle.
        rate - the rate of points forming the circle. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the circle.
        duration - how long to display the circle for.
        angle - rotation of the circle in degrees.
        axis - the axis of rotation for the circle.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a filled circle
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0

      • createSphere

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createSphere(org.bukkit.Location center,
                                             double radius,
                                             double rate,
                                             int update,
                                             long duration,
                                             com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawn a hollow sphere
        Parameters:
        center - location to spawn the sphere at.
        radius - radius of the sphere.
        rate - the rate of points forming the sphere. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to refresh the sphere.
        duration - how long to display the sphere for.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a filled circle
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0

      • createWave

        org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask createWave(org.bukkit.Location start,
                                           org.bukkit.Location end,
                                           double rate,
                                           int update,
                                           long duration,
                                           double cycles,
                                           double multiplier,
                                           double angle,
                                           char axis,
                                           com.zenya.aurora.util.ext.ZParticleDisplay display)
        Spawns a moving wave from a location to another.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting point of the wave.
        end - the ending point of the wave.
        rate - the rate of points of the wave. Lower values will spawn more particles.
        update - how often to extend the wave.
        duration - how long to display each particle in the wave for.
        cycles - how many full oscillations the wave should make from the start to end location
        multiplier - the amplitude of the wave
        angle - rotation of the wave in degrees.
        axis - the axis of rotation for the wave.
        display - ZParticleDisplay to display.
        Returns:
        BukkitTask for a moving wave
        Since:
        ZParticle 1.0.0
        See Also:
        drawLine(Player, double, double, int, long, ZParticleDisplay)
